Moxie [i](You may have this enter the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter. If you don't, get {E}{E}.)[/i]
Whenever Steelscale Sire deals combat damage to a player, you may pay up to that much {E}. If you do, create a 0/0 green Snake Hydra creature token with trample, then put X +1/+1 counters on it, where X is twice the amount of {E} paid this way.
